<Goodbye, Antoura: A Memoir of the Armenian Genocide
1:
--------------------
Text: Goodbye, Antoura:  The memoir, originally written in Armenian, follows the five-year old Karnig Panian through the years of the Armenian Genocide, through Anatolia and Syria, and finally to the College St. Joseph in Antoura, Lebanon, where the Ottoman Government had established an orphanage to Turkify surviving Armenian and Kurdish children.
